first_name.title: Name must be at most 25 characters
first_name.error_message: Name must be composed of only, at most 25, letters and whitespaces

last_name.title: Name must be at most 25 characters
last_name.error_message: Surname must be composed of only, at most 25, letters and whitespaces

email.label: E-mail address:
email.title: E-mail must be between 10 and 40 characters

phone_number.title: Phone number doesn't fit the pattern (prefix can be excluded)
phone_number.error_message: Phone number must be in the format (+00) 123 456 7890

object.label: Object of the Message
object.error_message: Object must be between 4 and 100 letters or whitespaces

message.label: Message:
message.error_message: Object must be between 11 and 499 characters
